## PDF library

```{python}
import re
from pathlib import Path

root = Path("papers")
pdfs = sorted(
    p for p in root.glob("*.pdf")
    if p.name.lower() != "index.pdf"
)

def nice_title(name):
    name = re.sub(r"[_-]+", " ", name)
    name = re.sub(r"\s+", " ", name).strip()
    return name[:-4] if name.lower().endswith(".pdf") else name

lines = [f"- [{nice_title(p.name)}]({p.name})" for p in pdfs]

print("\n".join(lines) if lines else "_No PDFs yet._")
